title: Create innings-context ranking views (chase vs defend)
description: Build team and player ranking views segmented by innings context (batting first/second, bowling first/second). Both since-2023 and all-time dual-scope. Covers: team chase/defend batting SR by phase, team chase/defend bowling economy by phase, player batting SR by innings, player bowling economy by innings. Feeds into future Rankings tab and season previews.

florentino_gate.reason: Core analytics feature for innings-context rankings.

deliverables: DuckDB views: 4 categories x 2 scopes = 8 innings-context views (team_batting_by_innings, team_bowling_by_innings, player_batting_by_innings, player_bowling_by_innings)
